greeting-p0:
🐵 I'm Madeleine! 😀 
Great to meet you!

I know things might be confusing for you or scary, but I know quite a lot about reproductive health so don't worry! I can help you by answering questions, giving hygiene product recommendations, or connecting you with local resources! I'm also multi-lingual! What would you like to do?
greeting-p1:
🐵 Great, try asking me a question!
I can answer something like 'What is a STD?'
You can also discover new questions by saying 'Show me random questions!'
Go for it!
greeting-p10: Great! 🙉 You will be most comfortable going with tampons since they make it easier for you to move around, especially if you want to swim.
greeting-p11: And how would you describe your menstrual flow? 🙊 I know it's scary to have a lot of blood come out of your body at once.
greeting-p12: Finally, how comfortable are you with your body? 🙊
greeting-p13: Great! 🙉 You will be most comfortable going with panty liners! They can catch a lot of blood and stay very well!
greeting-p14: No problem! 🙉 Your best choice is to go with pads! They are super easy to put on and also can hold a lot of blood.
greeting-p15: Great! 🙉 Your best choice is to go with tampons! They make it easy for you to move around after you learn how to put them on!
greeting-p2: 🐵 Ok! I'm going to ask you a few questions to see what product is best for you. I know it's hard to figure out which one works best for you! Do you like to exercise during your period?
greeting-p3: 🐵 Let's check out what resources are available in your local area! I'm going to ask you a few questions. First, what country are you in?
greeting-p4: 🐵 Okay, great! And what settlement are you in?
greeting-p5: What specifically are you looking for?🙊
greeting-p6: What specifically are you looking for?🙊
greeting-p7: What specifically are you looking for?🙊
greeting-p8: What specifically are you looking for?🙊
greeting-p9: What specifically are you looking for?🙊
